instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.body:
How to use GeppEmoji:

- On startup it shows the 'Recent' category and focuses the search entry.
- Choose a category or use 'Recent' to see your last used emoji.
- Type in the search box to filter emoji by name or keyword.

Mouse / Keyboard:
- Left click or Enter: insert the emoji (or accumulated emoji) and close.
- Shift + left click, right click or Shift + Enter: add the emoji to the buffer without closing.
- Middle click or Shift + T: edit custom keywords for the selected emoji.
- Esc: close the window without doing anything.
shortcuts.title: Shortcuts
shortcuts.body:
Keyboard and mouse shortcuts in GeppEmoji:

- Arrow keys: move between emoji.
- Enter: insert and paste the current emoji (plus any emoji already in the buffer).
- Shift + Enter: add the emoji to the buffer, do not paste.
- Left click: insert and paste.
- Shift + left click: add to buffer, do not paste.
- Right click: add to buffer, do not paste.
- Middle click: open the keyword editor for that emoji.
- Shift + T: open the keyword editor for the selected emoji.
- Esc: close the window.
